title: Farr Arm Rests offer aero comfort to take your rides farther with light, universal fit
content:
Farr’s new Arm Rest Kit isn’t their first go at bolt-on arm rests to extend the comfortable range of their tiny aerobar extensions. But this new setup was developed to be both lightweight and universal-fit, so they bolt onto any 31.8 bar whether you already ride with one of their Aero Bolt-Ons, Aero Gravel bar, […]
